location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.3163 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Jones’s earlier letter regarding the addition of an engagement to the slave trade suppression treaties signed with the Shaikhs of the Arab coast. Anderson writes that Jones’s actions are approved by Government, and that further instructions will follow.
